title: Concept of Server-side Clusterization of Semi-Static Big Geodata for Web Maps
abstract: The constant growth of geodata volume poses new challenges for effective data utilization in web maps. Traditionally, clustering in web maps is done on client-side and using JavaScript. This paper explores the limitations of client-side clustering in web-based geospatial applications and describes benefits of using a server-side clustering approach. The method proposed in this paper suits static and semi-static big geodata, offering improved load times and a more engaging user experience.
venue: International Conference on Computer Science and Information Technologies

journal.name: 2023 IEEE 18th International Conference on Computer Science and Information Technologies (CSIT)
